name: Medical verdict
description:
Try to pass a virtual medical examination with realistic graphics with a first-person view! Your attention is represented by the following doctors and procedures:
1. Inspection of the therapist
2. Inspection of the ophthalmologist
3. Survey of a psychiatrist
4. Passage of MRI (magnetic resonance imaging)
5. X-ray of the lungs and heart
6. GASTROSCOPY! Yes yes, it is precisely from the first person that it will help many to prepare for this procedure or just for the sake of interest to experience it virtually on oneself
7. Analysis of blood tests
8. The conclusion of the occupational pathologist
All inspections are accompanied by individual mini-games for reaction speed, luck and endurance.
At the end, each player receives an individual virtual health score on a fractional 100-point scale.
Compete against each other! Collect points, open bonuses and remember that this is just a game!
